statements: INSERT INTO telecommunications_data (id, phone_number, call_duration, call_date) VALUES (1, '1234567890', 300, '2022-01-01 10:00:00') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET phone_number = '1234567890', call_duration = 300, call_date = '2022-01-01 10:00:00';

INSERT INTO telecommunications_data (id, phone_number, call_duration, call_date) VALUES (2, '9876543210', 420, '2022-01-02 15:00:00') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET phone_number = '9876543210', call_duration = 420, call_date = '2022-01-02 15:00:00';

INSERT INTO telecommunications_data (id, phone_number, call_duration, call_date) VALUES (3, '5555555555', 180, '2022-01-03 09:00:00') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET phone_number = '5555555555', call_duration = 180, call_date = '2022-01-03 09:00:00';
INSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name) VALUES (1, 'John Doe') ON CONFLICT (customer_id) DO UPDATE SET customer_name = excluded.customer_name;
INSERT INTO orders (order_id, customer_id, product_name) VALUES (101, 1, 'Product A') ON CONFLICT (order_id) DO UPDATE SET product_name = excluded.product_name;
INSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith') ON CONFLICT (customer_id) DO UPDATE SET customer_name = excluded.customer_name;
UPSERT INTO Customers (customer_id, customer_name, phone_number, email) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', '123-456-7890', 'john.doe@example.com')
UPSERT INTO Orders (order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-01-15', 100.00)
UPSERT INTO Products (product_id, product_name, description, price) VALUES (1, 'Product A', 'Description for Product A', 50.00)

INSERT INTO customers (customer_name, phone_number, address) VALUES ('John Doe', '123-456-7890', '123 Main St') ON CONFLICT (customer_name) DO UPDATE SET phone_number = EXCLUDED.phone_number, address = EXCLUDED.address;

INSERT INTO plans (plan_name, plan_description, plan_price, plan_type) VALUES ('Standard Plan', 'Includes basic features', 29.99, 'Standard') ON CONFLICT (plan_name) DO UPDATE SET plan_description = EXCLUDED.plan_description, plan_price = EXCLUDED.plan_price, plan_type = EXCLUDED.plan_type;

INSERT INTO subscriptions (customer_id, plan_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-01-01', NULL) ON CONFLICT (customer_id, plan_id) DO UPDATE SET start_date = EXCLUDED.start_date, end_date = EXCLUDED.end_date;

UPSERT INTO customers (id, name, phone_number, email) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', '123-456-7890', 'john.doe@example.com') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'John Doe', phone_number = '123-456-7890', email = 'john.doe@example.com';

UPSERT INTO contracts (contract_id, customer_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 1, '2022-01-01', '2023-01-01') ON CONFLICT (contract_id) DO UPDATE SET customer_id = 1, start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2023-01-01';
UPSERT INTO invoices (invoice_id, contract_id, amount, due_date) VALUES (1, 1, 100.00, '2022-02-01') ON CONFLICT (invoice_id) DO UPDATE SET contract_id = 1, amount = 100.00, due_date = '2022-02-01';
